meanings.definition: A fragrant white or yellow flower.
meanings.sent1: The jessamine in the garden smells lovely.
meanings.sent2: I picked a bouquet of jessamine for my mom.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzz happily around the jessamine.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as sweet as jessamine.
meanings.sent5: The jessamine blooms brightened up the room.

meanings.definition: A climbing plant with fragrant flowers.
meanings.sent1: The jessamine vine twined around the trellis.
meanings.sent2: She admired the delicate beauty of the jessamine plant.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the jessamine as a ladder.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him grew like a jessamine vine.
meanings.sent5: The jessamine blossoms danced in the breeze.

meanings.definition: A perfume made from the oil of jasmine flowers.
meanings.sent1: She dabbed a bit of jessamine behind her ears.
meanings.sent2: The room was filled with the scent of jessamine.
meanings.sent3: He joked that the jessamine perfume was his secret weapon.
meanings.sent4: Her presence was as intoxicating as jessamine.
meanings.sent5: The jessamine fragrance lingered in the air.
